reviews.review_msg: Easy B grade if you put in the effort, very interesting lectures. Sheri is passionate about the course. Guest lectures are especially entertaining, and her lectures and expectations are extremely clear. Quizzes are okay. No surprises when it comes to tests. Would definitely recommend this class!

Okay- someone please tell Barry that some of us are not straight from high school. He spends way too much time babying the class- is off topic frequently, and takes his sweet time getting to the point. Positive note- he's fair- up front- and is helpful. Wish he would make the lectures more challenging or stimulating, minus the bad jokes.
